Hi,

In the following MSDN article, you can find an example of a DataGrid style, where a DataIndicatorStyle is defined:

  • DataGrid Styles and Templates

Also, in the Stock Trader RI for Silverlight (included with Prism), in the App.xaml file of its main project, you can find a CustomHeaderStyle which is used as a style for the DragIndicatorStyle property of several DataGrids in the application.

However, as this is not strictly related to Prism but to Silverlight and its DataGrid control, I believe you could find better support in the Silverlight forums:

  • Silverlight Forums
